subjects.content:
🎨 Design Phase

Key design deliverables and milestones:

  • UI/UX Design 🖼️
    • User Flow Mapping
    • Wireframe Creation
    • Design System Setup
  • Stakeholder Engagement 👥
    • Design Reviews
    • Feedback Sessions
    • Iteration Planning

⚙️ Development Infrastructure

Setup status and requirements:

  • Environment Setup 🛠️
    • Development: Ready ✅
    • Staging: In Progress ⏳
    • Production: Pending 📝
  • DevOps Pipeline 🔄
    • CI/CD Configuration
    • Monitoring Setup
    • Backup Systems

🔨 Core Development

Feature implementation timeline:

  1. Authentication 🔐
    • Social Login Integration
    • Email Verification
    • Password Recovery
  2. User Management 👤
    • Profile Creation
    • Settings Configuration
  3. Data Handling 📊
    • Sync Implementation
    • Offline Support

🧪 Quality Assurance

Testing requirements and coverage:

  • Testing Strategy ✅
    • Unit Testing (90%)
    • Integration Testing (75%)
    • E2E Testing (Key Flows)
  • Performance Metrics 📈
    • Load Testing
    • Stress Testing

📱 App Store Optimization

Store presence optimization:

  • Store Listing 🎯
    • Keyword Research
    • Description Writing
    • Visual Assets
  • Marketing Materials 📣
    • Promotional Videos
    • Screenshots Design

🚀 Launch Preparation

Pre-launch checklist and timeline:

  1. Final Checks 🔍
    • Security Audit
    • Performance Testing
    • Beta Feedback Review
  2. Launch Strategy 📅
    • Rollout Plan
    • Monitoring Setup

📈 Post-Launch Monitoring

Key metrics and analysis:

  • Analytics 📊
    • User Engagement
    • Performance Metrics
    • Error Tracking
  • User Feedback 👥
    • App Store Reviews
    • Support Tickets
